body.p:
To His Excellency
Thos. E Bremlett
Govenor of Kentucky

You Petitioner
Would Respectfully Represent that While a Soldier in the 39th Ky Vols in his camp He Played a Game of Poker or Games with some of His Fellow Soldiers For small Amts
That at the Oct Term Term of the Lawrence Circuit Court 1863 He was Indicted for the same
Your Petitioner is not a Gambler & never won or lost ($5.00) Five Dollars in the World on Poker or any other Game

You Petitioner lives in the state of West Va but does not like to have his name called Every Court in connection with this matter & would ask all the Cases Except his was dissmissed where Soldier offendy during the war in this Particular offense that your Excellency Pardon Him for which he will be Ever Gratful
yours

G T Justice
Your Petitioner would Respectfully join in the Prayer of George Justice for Pardon
